@param _amount Units of StakingToken

stake
exit
exit

@dev Withdraws given stake amount from the pool
@param _amount Units of the staked token to withdraw
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation:
@dev Claims only the tokens that have been immediately unlocked, not including
those that are in the lockers.

claimRewards

claimReward().details: Claims only the tokens that have been immediately unlocked, not including those that are in the lockers.

claimRewards().details: Claims all unlocked rewards for sender. Note, this function is costly - the args for _claimRewards should be determined off chain and then passed to other fn

claimRewards(uint256,uint256).details: Claims all unlocked rewards for sender. Both immediately unlocked rewards and also locked rewards past their time lock.

params._first: Index of the first array element to claim
params._last: Index of the last array element to claim

earned(address).details: Returned the units of IMMEDIATELY claimable rewards a user has to receive. Note - this does NOT include the majority of rewards which will be locked up.

exit().details: Withdraws stake from pool and claims any unlocked rewards. Note, this function is costly - the args for _claimRewards should be determined off chain and then passed to other fn

exit(uint256,uint256).details: Withdraws stake from pool and claims any unlocked rewards.

params._first: Index of the first array element to claim
params._last: Index of the last array element to claim

lastTimeRewardApplicable().details: Gets the last applicable timestamp for this reward period

pokeBoost(address).details: Pokes a given account to reset the boost

rewardPerToken().details: Calculates the amount of unclaimed rewards per token since last update, and sums with stored to give the new cumulative reward per token

stake(address,uint256).details: Stakes a given amount of the StakingToken for a given beneficiary

params._beneficiary: Staked tokens are credited to this address

stake(uint256).details: Stakes a given amount of the StakingToken for the sender

unclaimedRewards(address).details: Calculates all unclaimed reward data, finding both immediately unlocked rewards and those that have passed their time lock.
unclaimedRewards(address).return: amount Total units of unclaimed rewardsfirst Index of the first userReward that has unlockedlast Index of the last userReward that has unlocked

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraws given stake amount from the pool

params._amount: Units of the staked token to withdraw
